an2.235-239:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these two wholesome qualities. What two? (235) Non-anger and non-hostility … (236) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (237) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (238) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (239) Moral shame and moral dread. These are the two wholesome qualities."
